alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 10:04PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Haywood and western Madison Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 1004 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dancyville, or near Brownsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Brownsville, Bemis, Hillville, Dancyville, Mercer, Carroll, Medon, Asbury, Neely, Huntersville, Hickory Point, Westover, Madison Hall, Uptonville, Shepp, Gilmore, Leighton, East Union and Malesus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
